mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NAME, AGE_RANGE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE, LIKES FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) B) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TABLE_BOARD (BOARD_NO, USER_NAME, AGE_RANGE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, LIKES) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{user_name}, #{age_range}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, SYSDATE, 0)
